verses.text: On one occasion, as Jesus was going, on a Sabbath into the house of one of the leading Pharisees to dine, they were watching him closely.
There he saw before him a man who was suffering from dropsy.

“\+w Is|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w it|strong="G2532"\+w* allowable,”said Jesus, addressing the students of the Law and the Pharisees, “\+w to|strong="G4314"\+w* work \+w a|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w cure|strong="G2323"\+w* \+w on|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w the|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w Sabbath|strong="G4521"\+w*, \+w or|strong="G2228"\+w* \+w is|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w it|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3756"\+w*?”
They remained silent. Jesus took hold of the man and cured him, and sent him away.

And he said to them, “\+w Which|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w of|strong="G5207"\+w* \+w you|strong="G5210"\+w*, finding \+w that|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w your|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w son|strong="G5207"\+w* \+w or|strong="G2228"\+w* \+w your|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w ox|strong="G1016"\+w* \+w has|strong="G5101"\+w* \+w fallen|strong="G4098"\+w* \+w into|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w a|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w well|strong="G2532"\+w*, \+w will|strong="G5101"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w immediately|strong="G2112"\+w* pull \+w them|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w out|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w on|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w the|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w Sabbath|strong="G4521"\+w* \+w day|strong="G2250"\+w*?”
And they could not make any answer to that.
Observing that the guests were choosing the best places for themselves, Jesus told them this parable –

“\+w When|strong="G3752"\+w* \+w you|strong="G4771"\+w* \+w are|strong="G1510"\+w* \+w invited|strong="G2564"\+w* \+w by|strong="G5259"\+w* \+w anyone|strong="G5100"\+w* \+w to|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w a|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w wedding|strong="G1062"\+w* banquet, \+w do|strong="G3361"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3361"\+w* seat \+w yourself|strong="G4771"\+w* \+w in|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w the|strong="G1519"\+w* best \+w place|strong="G4411"\+w*. \+w Someone|strong="G5100"\+w* \+w of|strong="G5259"\+w* higher rank \+w might|strong="G2564"\+w* \+w have|strong="G1510"\+w* \+w been|strong="G1510"\+w* \+w invited|strong="G2564"\+w* \+w by|strong="G5259"\+w* \+w your|strong="G5259"\+w* host;

\+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w the|strong="G2532"\+w* host \+w who|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w invited|strong="G2564"\+w* \+w you|strong="G4771"\+w* \+w both|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w will|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w come|strong="G2064"\+w* \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w say|strong="G3004"\+w* \+w to|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w you|strong="G4771"\+w* ‘\+w Make|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w room|strong="G5117"\+w* \+w for|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w this|strong="G3778"\+w* \+w person|strong="G3778"\+w*,’ \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w then|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w you|strong="G4771"\+w* \+w will|strong="G2532"\+w* begin \+w in|strong="G2532"\+w* confusion \+w to|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w take|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w the|strong="G2532"\+w* lowest \+w place|strong="G5117"\+w*.

\+w For|strong="G3754"\+w* \+w everyone|strong="G3956"\+w* \+w who|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w exalts|strong="G5312"\+w* \+w themselves|strong="G1438"\+w* \+w will|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w be|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w humbled|strong="G5013"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w everyone|strong="G3956"\+w* \+w who|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w humbles|strong="G5013"\+w* \+w themselves|strong="G1438"\+w* \+w will|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w be|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w exalted|strong="G5312"\+w*.”

Then Jesus went on to say to the man who had invited him, “\+w When|strong="G3752"\+w* \+w you|strong="G4771"\+w* \+w give|strong="G4160"\+w* \+w a|strong="G1096"\+w* breakfast \+w or|strong="G2228"\+w* \+w a|strong="G1096"\+w* \+w dinner|strong="G1173"\+w*, \+w do|strong="G4160"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3361"\+w* \+w ask|strong="G3004"\+w* \+w your|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w friends|strong="G5384"\+w*, \+w or|strong="G2228"\+w* \+w your|strong="G2532"\+w* brothers \+w or|strong="G2228"\+w* sisters, \+w or|strong="G2228"\+w* \+w your|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w relatives|strong="G4773"\+w*, \+w or|strong="G2228"\+w* \+w rich|strong="G4145"\+w* \+w neighbors|strong="G1069"\+w*, \+w because|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w they|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w might|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w invite|strong="G2564"\+w* \+w you|strong="G4771"\+w* \+w in|strong="G2532"\+w* return, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w so|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w you|strong="G4771"\+w* \+w should|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w be|strong="G1096"\+w* repaid.

No, \+w when|strong="G3752"\+w* \+w you|strong="G3752"\+w* entertain, \+w invite|strong="G2564"\+w* \+w the|strong="G4160"\+w* \+w poor|strong="G4434"\+w*, \+w the|strong="G4160"\+w* crippled, \+w the|strong="G4160"\+w* \+w lame|strong="G5560"\+w*, \+w the|strong="G4160"\+w* \+w blind|strong="G5185"\+w*;

\+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w then|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w you|strong="G4771"\+w* \+w will|strong="G1510"\+w* \+w be|strong="G1510"\+w* \+w happy|strong="G3107"\+w* \+w indeed|strong="G2532"\+w*, \+w since|strong="G3754"\+w* \+w they|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w cannot|strong="G3756"\+w* reward \+w you|strong="G4771"\+w*; \+w for|strong="G1063"\+w* \+w you|strong="G4771"\+w* \+w will|strong="G1510"\+w* \+w be|strong="G1510"\+w* rewarded \+w at|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w the|strong="G1722"\+w* resurrection \+w of|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w the|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w just|strong="G1342"\+w*.”
One of the guests heard what he said and exclaimed, “Happy will be the person who will eat bread in the kingdom of God!”

But Jesus said to him, “\+w A|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w man|strong="G5100"\+w* \+w was|strong="G3588"\+w* once \+w giving|strong="G4160"\+w* \+w a|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w great|strong="G3173"\+w* \+w dinner|strong="G1173"\+w*. \+w He|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w invited|strong="G2564"\+w* \+w many|strong="G4183"\+w* \+w people|strong="G4160"\+w*,

\+w They|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w all|strong="G3956"\+w* \+w with|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w one|strong="G1520"\+w* accord \+w began|strong="G2192"\+w* \+w to|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w ask|strong="G2065"\+w* \+w to|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w be|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w excused|strong="G3868"\+w*. \+w The|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w first|strong="G4413"\+w* \+w said|strong="G3004"\+w* \+w to|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w the|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w servant|strong="G3588"\+w* ‘\+w I|strong="G1473"\+w* \+w have|strong="G2192"\+w* bought \+w a|strong="G2192"\+w* field \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w am|strong="G1473"\+w* \+w obliged|strong="G2192"\+w* \+w to|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w go|strong="G1831"\+w* \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w look|strong="G3708"\+w* \+w at|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w it|strong="G2532"\+w*. \+w I|strong="G1473"\+w* \+w must|strong="G2192"\+w* \+w ask|strong="G2065"\+w* \+w you|strong="G4771"\+w* \+w to|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w consider|strong="G2192"\+w* \+w me|strong="G1473"\+w* \+w excused|strong="G3868"\+w*.’

Presently \+w the|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w servant|strong="G1401"\+w* \+w said|strong="G3004"\+w* ‘\+w Sir|strong="G2962"\+w*, \+w your|strong="G2962"\+w* \+w order|strong="G2004"\+w* \+w has|strong="G2962"\+w* \+w been|strong="G1510"\+w* \+w carried|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w out|strong="G2532"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w still|strong="G2089"\+w* \+w there|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w is|strong="G1510"\+w* \+w room|strong="G5117"\+w*.’

One day, when great crowds of people were walking with Jesus, he turned and said to them,

“\+w If|strong="G1487"\+w* \+w any|strong="G5100"\+w* \+w one|strong="G5100"\+w* \+w comes|strong="G2064"\+w* \+w to|strong="G4314"\+w* \+w me|strong="G1473"\+w* \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w does|strong="G1510"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w hate|strong="G3404"\+w* \+w their|strong="G1438"\+w* \+w father|strong="G3962"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w mother|strong="G3384"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w wife|strong="G1135"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w children|strong="G5043"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* brothers, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* sisters, \+w yes|strong="G2089"\+w* \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w even|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w their|strong="G1438"\+w* \+w life|strong="G5590"\+w*, \+w he|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w can|strong="G1410"\+w* \+w be|strong="G1510"\+w* \+w no|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w disciple|strong="G3101"\+w* \+w of|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w mine|strong="G1473"\+w*.

\+w Otherwise|strong="G3379"\+w*, \+w if|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w you|strong="G3956"\+w* \+w have|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w laid|strong="G5087"\+w* \+w the|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w foundation|strong="G2310"\+w* \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w are|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3361"\+w* \+w able|strong="G2480"\+w* \+w to|strong="G2443"\+w* \+w finish|strong="G1615"\+w* \+w it|strong="G2532"\+w*, \+w everyone|strong="G3956"\+w* \+w who|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w sees|strong="G2334"\+w* \+w it|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w will|strong="G2532"\+w* laugh \+w at|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w you|strong="G3956"\+w*,
